name: Fidget Spinner
description: Fidget Spinner, the game you were all waiting for, yes, also you who are reading, I know that in the depths of your heart, you were waiting for a game like this!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce G210M or higher Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce G210M or higher Storage: 60 MB available space
